no-line-supported-card.header: No Line of Credit available at this address

metadata.unsecured: This is an unsecured line of credit. You MUST trust the borrower.

revenue.title: Revenue
revenue.tooltip: The total USD value of the revenue generated by the attached revenue contracts.

tooltip.total: The total USD value of the collateral deposited by the borrower.
tooltip.symbol: The ticker symbol of the collateral asset
tooltip.type: Collateral type can be REVENUE or ASSET. REVENUE is the lender's split of the revenue generated by an attached revenue contract. ASSET is the collateral deposited by the borrower.
tooltip.value: The USD value of the collateral

tooltip.principal: Total credit utilized by the borrower.
tooltip.deposit: Total credit available for the borrower.
tooltip.total-interest-paid: The total interest paid by the borrower across all credit positions.
tooltip.borrower-revenue-split: Revenue percentage allocated to the borrower for the line of credit.
tooltip.lender-revenue-split: Revenue percentage allocated to the lender for the line of credit.
tooltip.min-cratio: The minimum collateralization ratio for the line of credit.
tooltip.cratio: The current collateralization ratio for the line of credit.
tooltip.status: Current status of the line of credit. Status can be Active, Liqudidable, Repaid, Insolvent, Unitialized, or No Status.
tooltip.start: The day the line of credit was deployed by the borrower.
tooltip.end: The expiration date of the line of credit.

credit-events.title: Payment History
credit-events.no-data: No payment history on this line

positions-table.no-data: No positions on this Line of Credit
